txt.en: Wild minnows can be found in the ponds of the Wildwood.\n\nYou should fish for wild minnows.
A storage crate can be found in either Trader's Wharf or Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should place the wild minnows in a storage crate.
Place the wild minnows in a storage crate
Fish for wild minnows in the Wildwood ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Caught wild minnows in the Wildwood ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Someone has posted a task to fish for minnows in the Wildwood.
The bulletin notice reads:\n\n'Needed: Minnows from the Wildwood for meals and trade. You will be rewarded for your efforts.'
